definitions.definition: A bet in which the bettor must select the first three placegetters of a race in the order in which they finish.
The attainment of three important achievements , qualities , etc.
A set of three related things, often things that cause problems.
The complete legislative and executive control of state or federal government by one party: governorship , the upper house , and the lower house of state or federal legislatures.

main_definition: ( gambling ) A bet in which the bettor must select the first three placegetters of a race in the order in which they finish.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) The attainment of three important achievements , qualities , etc.
( by extension ) A set of three related things, often things that cause problems.
( US politics ) The complete legislative and executive control of state or federal government by one party: governorship , the upper house , and the lower house of state or federal legislatures.
